profileAlternative.name: Zhen Wang
profileAlternative.headline: Looking for passionate software engineers to work in compiler area.

positions.title: MathWorks
positions.description:
Lead a team in MathWorks to improve the run-time performance of code generated by Embedded Coder by exploiting data parallelism. Improve/extend in-house IR to make it more suitable for representing data parallelism. Enhance loop transform infrastructure to help parallel code generation and more. Develop technologies to better take advantage of third party libraries and vendor libraries in the generated code. Co-lead the effort in bringing inspirations from DSLs such as Halide into MATLAB and Simulink to improve the run-time performance of the generated code in certain application domains, e.g. image processing, vision processing, automated dirving, etc. Participate in the effort of raising the in-house IR abstraction level and enabling more user-guided (loop) optimization from MATLAB front-end. Enable cuda code generation from Simulink models.

Build research culture within the coder team in MathWorks. Keep track of state-of-the-art new development in both industry and academia compiler communities for (parallel) IR design, DSL and domain specific optimizations.

positions.title:
Title
Principal Software Engineer, Team Lead
positions.description: Continue work on general IR analysis and transform. Start to lead the effort in MathWorks in designing, developing and improving compiler analysis and transforms that enable generating parallel code using Embedded Coder and MATLAB Coder, e.g. SIMD vectorization and parallel loop generation.

positions.title:
Title
Senior Software Engineer
positions.description:
Work on general compiler analysis and optimizations to improve the run-time performance of the generated code. Go-to person for the ModRef analysis and Alias analysis within MathWorks coder team. Design and develop a new fine-grained ModRef analysis. Initiate the work for building a better memory model in the in-house IR. Design and developed a new Alias analysis information container, which has low construction complexity and is easy and fast to use for query information such as point-to (set), pointed-by (set), etc. Both ModRef and AliasAnalysis infrastructures are used in the core IR for products such as MATLAB Coder and Embedded Coder.

positions.title: Senior Software Tools Engineer
positions.description:
 Design, implement and maintain the elf standard assembler/disassembler for different processors for mobile applications and smart TVs.
 Add new non-standard features into the preprocessor used by multiple tools such as assembler.
 Design scripts for (1) generating the assembler/disassembler encoding and decoding tests; (2) generating the decoder from architecture description file for fast functional simulator.
 Build and maintain the nightly test suite for new features of the assembler.
 Participate in the IP enhancements of processors for mobile applications. Implemented several new features in the cycle accurate simulator.
 Implemented the prototype of the fast functional simulator for processors.
 Participate in the development of migration libraries to speed up the design and implementation of mobile application algorithms on new processors.
 Participate in the investigation of different test generation methodologies for testing simulator and RTL.
